sentence: Republican states sue to stop Biden admin’s lifting of Title 42 border policy https://t.co/r8v6MoexYp — Fox News (@FoxNews) April 4, 2022 Republican States Push Back Attorneys General Mark Brnovich of Arizona, Jeff Landry of Louisiana, and Eric Schmitt of Missouri have filed the lawsuit.
author: Becky Noble
title: GOP States Sue As Biden Adm. Lifts Title 42 Order, Expected To Create Surge Of Illegal Immigrants At Border

sentence: La petición es firmada por los fiscales generales de Arizona, Mark Brnovich; de Missouri, Eric Schmitt, y la procuradora general de Louisiana, Elizabeth Murrill.
title: Tres estados republicanos piden a juez bloquear decisión de Biden para terminar el Título 42 contra inmigrantes

sentence: To states like Arizona, Texas, and California, “it’s throwing gasoline on a fire,” state Attorney General Mark Brnovich (R-Ariz.) shook his head.
author: Family Research Council
title: VIDEO: ‘Human Tsunami’ Puts Border on the Brink
